selections.name: French Riviera
selections.reason: Draws perfectly in barrier 3 for the +9.5m rail. Proven ability to handle soft going (3:0-0-3) and comes off a solid 2nd at this track/distance.

selections.name: Abraham
selections.reason: Consistent performer with a strong rating (62 last start). The main danger, though barrier 8 is tricky with the rail out this far.

selections.name: Paper Doll
selections.reason: Knocking on the door with back-to-back 2nd place finishes. Handles the wet and maps well from gate 5.

selections.name: He Is The Kiss
selections.reason: Perennial maiden (44 starts) but consistently in the money. A must for exotics but hard to back for the win.

danger_horse.name: Abraham
danger_horse.reason: Has the highest recent speed figures and will be right in the finish if he can overcome the wide draw.

selections.name: Artistic Endeavour
selections.reason: Standout selection. Consistent form (2nd last 3 starts), maps perfectly from barrier 4, and brings the strongest speed figures (72) to this field.

selections.name: Battuta
selections.reason: Waller runner stepping up to the mile which should suit. Drawn to get a soft run on the rail.

selections.name: Weekend Spirit
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start at Ipswich. Light weight and should be competitive for the minors.

selections.name: Little Miss Classy
selections.reason: Fair effort last start. Place chance in a field that falls away in quality after the top pick.

selections.name: Mediterra
selections.reason: Maher stable runner with strong form in NSW (2nd last two starts). Speed figures (62) are superior to this field. Wide gate is the only concern.

selections.name: Wiliamtheconqueror
selections.reason: Resuming from a break. Placed at this track previously. Barrier 1 is a massive advantage with the rail out +9.5m.

selections.name: Tszyuya
selections.reason: Gollan/Lang combination. Trial winner resuming. Watch betting market closely.

selections.name: Toro Chase
selections.reason: Resuming. Has shown ability in previous preps. Place chance.

danger_horse.name: Wiliamtheconqueror
danger_horse.reason: Inside draw on this track profile is a major equalizer against the favorite.

selections.name: Modesty
selections.reason: Freedman runner who was excellent 2nd first-up. Will strip fitter and handles the distance. Strong win chance.

selections.name: French Endeavour
selections.reason: Drops significantly in class from a BM78. Proven quality but carries weight. Soft track stats are okay.

selections.name: Trapedo
selections.reason: Scratched from Race 7 to run here? If running, barrier 1 and light weight (119lbs) make him a threat.

selections.name: Kadall
selections.reason: Forgive last start. Previous form was solid. Good soft track record (9:0-2-4).

danger_horse.name: French Endeavour
danger_horse.reason: Class runner of the field. If he handles the weight, he wins.

selections.name: Heavenly Impact
selections.reason: Massive class drop from running 4th in a Class 6 to this Class 1. Barrier 1 is ideal. Should be winning this.

selections.name: Fireforce
selections.reason: Consistent type. 2nd last start. Maps well from barrier 3 to follow the favorite.

selections.name: Bells Of Steel
selections.reason: Vandyke runner resuming. Won first-up previously. Watch for market support.

selections.name: Castello Grande
selections.reason: Resuming. Heathcote/Duric combo always dangerous, though barrier 10 hurts.

selections.name: Lenape Vibe
selections.reason: Waller stayer who hit the line well for 3rd last start. Distance suits perfectly. Wide gate less of an issue over this trip.

selections.name: Bitoftheblarney
selections.reason: Another Waller runner. Consistent without winning. Soft track stats are solid (16:1-4-2).

selections.name: Whatjeudoin'
selections.reason: Good 2nd last start. Drops to 121lbs. Competitive.

selections.name: Liberty Park
selections.reason: Waller's third stringer? Barrier 1 gives him the run of the race. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Bitoftheblarney
danger_horse.reason: Waller stablemates often upset the pecking order.

selections.name: Zou Big Boy
selections.reason: Gollan runner. Form is solid for this grade. Barrier 4 allows him to sit on pace which is critical today.

selections.name: The Wheelbarrow
selections.reason: Emergency gaining a start? 3rd last time out. Light weight and improving.

selections.name: Change The Date
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent record. Handles soft going.

selections.name: Rashford
selections.reason: Munce runner. Barrier 3 is a plus. Can mix form but best is good enough.

danger_horse.name: The Wheelbarrow
danger_horse.reason: Lightly raced improver in a field of exposed form.

selections.name: Ser Joh
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd in this grade last start. Maps perfectly from barrier 3. High rating (85). The one to beat.

selections.name: Tribeca Star
selections.reason: Class runner. 3rd in CL6 two starts back. Barrier 2 is ideal. Major threat.

selections.name: Mister Bianco
selections.reason: Proven at this level. 5th in BM90 shows class. Soft track winner.

selections.name: Sultry Siren
selections.reason: Light weight (121lbs) and barrier 1. Will be in it for a long way.

danger_horse.name: Tribeca Star
danger_horse.reason: Has the class to win if the pace is hot.
